data.text:
The summer intensive training begins today. In preparation for 
this, I created two training regimens for Admire Vega.
data.processed:
󠁿The summer intensive training begins today. In preparation for 
󠁿this, I created two training regimens for Admire Vega.

data.text:
Simply put, one menu can be done alone 
while the other must be done in tandem with me.
data.processed:
󠁿Simply put, one menu can be done alone 
󠁿while the other must be done in tandem with me.

data.text:
I told her she was free to choose either and showed 
her both of the regimens. I expected an immediate 
reply, but she seemed hesitant to answer.
data.processed:
󠁿I told her she was free to choose either and showed 
󠁿her both of the regimens. I expected an immediate 
󠁿reply, but she seemed hesitant to answer.

data.text: Give me… some time to think.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Give me… some time to think.

data.text: After saying that she headed into the cabin.
data.processed: 󠁿After saying that she headed into the cabin.

data.text: These regimens… she really put a lot of thought into both of them.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿These regimens… she really 󠁿put a lot of thought into both of them.

data.text:
<i>She's also added training to help 
me improve my movement fundamentals.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿<i>She's also added training to help 
󠁿me improve my movement fundamentals.

data.text: This training is suited specifically for my running style. Made specifically for me.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿This training is suited specifically for 󠁿my running style. Made specifically for me.

data.text: I know she said she didn't care which one I chose… But I can tell just by looking at these that what I need is… to cooperate with her.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿I know she said she didn't care which one I chose… But I 󠁿can tell just by looking at these that what I need is… to 󠁿cooperate with her.

data.text: But…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿But…

data.text: Trainer-san. Regarding the… training regimen.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Trainer-san. Regarding the… training regimen.

data.text: I… want…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿I… want…

data.text: I… want to…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿I… want to…

data.text:
Admire Vega was searching for the right words. She had already 
made her decision, but was unsure of the right way to say it.
data.processed:
󠁿Admire Vega was searching for the right words. She had already 
󠁿made her decision, but was unsure of the right way to say it.

data.text:
But a feeling of care and 
consideration could be felt around her…
data.processed:
󠁿But a feeling of care and 
󠁿consideration could be felt around her…

data.text: Eh?
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Eh?

data.text: Trainer-san…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Trainer-san…

data.text: You're right… Thank you.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿You're right… Thank you.

data.text:
Admire Vega chose to go with the 
regimen that she could do on her own.
data.processed:
󠁿Admire Vega chose to go with the 
󠁿regimen that she could do on her own.

data.text:
As she conducted her training I continued to watch 
over her and continued to support her as her trainer.
data.processed:
󠁿As she conducted her training I continued to watch 
󠁿over her and continued to support her as her trainer.

data.text:
Then night fell. I sat alone, looking up at the Summer Triangle 
with the picture book that Admire Vega had recommended me in hand.

choices.text: Vega, Deneb… and what's the last one?
choices.processed: <size=41>Vega, Deneb… and what's the last one?</size>

data.processed:
󠁿Then night fell. I sat alone, looking up at the Summer Triangle 
󠁿with the picture book that Admire Vega had recommended me in hand.

data.text:
I shuffled through the pages of 
the book looking for the answer, when…
data.processed:
󠁿I shuffled through the pages of 
󠁿the book looking for the answer, when…

data.text:
Altair, it's the first magnitude 
star in the Aquila constellation.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿Altair, it's the first magnitude 
󠁿star in the Aquila constellation.

data.text: Admire Vega happened to be there.

choices.text: Did you come to stargaze too?

data.processed: 󠁿Admire Vega happened to be there.

data.text: Yes…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Yes…

data.text: Trainer-san…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Trainer-san…

data.text:
Today's training… was very easy to do. I felt like as I pushed 
forward… I was actually accomplishing something.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿Today's training… was very easy to do. I felt like as I pushed 
󠁿forward… I was actually accomplishing something.

data.text: Y-Yes… But.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Y-Yes… But.

data.text: The harder you work for my sake… the more my heart hurts.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿The harder you work for my sake… the more my heart hurts.

data.text:
Your expectations, your effort. If they're real… 
if they're real, I don't deserve it, my sister…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿Your expectations, your effort. If they're real… 
󠁿if they're real, I don't deserve it, my sister…

data.text: Even though she… Even though I…
data.name: Admire Vega

choices.text: You think only your sister deserves this?
choices.processed: <size=40>You think only your sister deserves this?</size>

choices.text: You think only your sister deserves this?
choices.processed: <size=40>You think only your sister deserves this?</size>

data.processed: 󠁿Even though she… Even though I…

data.text: Eh…?
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Eh…?

data.text: I don't know much about her little sister.
data.processed: 󠁿I don't know much about her little sister.

data.text:
But what I do know is that the thought of 
her sister is causing her immeasurable pain. That's why…

choices.text: If you're truly running for her sake…
If you're truly running for her sake…

data.processed:
󠁿But what I do know is that the thought of 
󠁿her sister is causing her immeasurable pain. That's why…

data.text:
Neither the training regimen nor my past 
advice was meant solely for Admire Vega.

choices.text: Everything I did was for the both of you.
choices.processed: <size=41>Everything I did was for the both of you.</size>

choices.text: Everything I did was for the both of you.
choices.processed: <size=41>Everything I did was for the both of you.</size>

data.processed:
󠁿Neither the training regimen nor my past 
󠁿advice was meant solely for Admire Vega.

data.text: For… us…?
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿For… us…?

data.text: For me… and for… her…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿For me… and for… her…

data.text: Ahh, I think I finally understand.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Ahh, I think I finally understand.

data.text: That time I went home without looking up at the stars…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿That time I went home without looking up at the stars…

data.text: And that time you called out to me at the planetarium…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿And that time you called out to me at the planetarium…

data.text: You didn't do all of that for 'me'… You did it for 'us', didn't you.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿You didn't do all of that for 'me'… 󠁿You did it for 'us', didn't you.

data.text:
Admire Vega sat next to me and looked 
up at the dazzlingly beautiful night sky…
data.processed:
󠁿Admire Vega sat next to me and looked 
󠁿up at the dazzlingly beautiful night sky…

data.text: I guess I can teach you a little bit about the stars…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿I guess I can teach you a little bit about the stars…

data.text:
She then softly explained the glittering 
objects present billions of light years away.
data.processed:
󠁿She then softly explained the glittering 
󠁿objects present billions of light years away.
